author: potuz
content: I am finishing writing the EIP and realized that for withdrawals we could simply process them with the execution payload, just as today, without changes, instead of having this lock-fulfil mechanism. I am not certain of tradeoffs here. Potential problems can be the fact that the balances may continue changing on the beacon chain and that the builder code will have to perform more complex operations, but still it feels like probably a good change. I'll add this to the agenda for next Friday, will probably open the EIP anyway with the current mechanism if the coauthors agree.
